ENGINEERING TECHNICIAN

An experienced CAD and GIS Technician able to produce detailed drawings and maps which are clear and accurate.
I am able to analyze databases and generate custom maps and reports with different tools of the trade.
I am always curious to learn new skills and technologies that enhance my productivity in a complex organization.
Adaptable to work for long periods and under the most stressed situations without losing focus and patience.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Strategic Finance Manager

Location: San Francisco Bay Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Finance, Strategy/Planning

Description:
Job description:Keen to join one of the fastest growing consumer tech companies while weâ€™re still scaling? Want to work for an organisation that values sustainability like you? Passionate about the opportunity to play a vital role in the creation of a fully fledged, scalable and global marketplace where you get to see the impact of your work every day? ðŸš€ 
Create The Circular Economy With Us At Reebelo.com, we empower customers to buy their favourite tech devices & lifestyle products in a more sustainable way. Our mission is to refresh the way we all consume, delivered through a platform built on sustainable values and quality-assured products. We are looking for motivated team members like yourself with an innovative mindset. In 3 years we launched 8 countries, raised $50M from top investors and scaled to 9-digit gross sales. Change the world, and supercharge your career with Reebelo!
At Reebelo, we value the balance between in-person collaboration and the flexibility needed to live our daily lives. Our team operates on a hybrid model, requiring 2-3 days of office per week. This role is located in the Bay Area, CA with an office location in San Mateo, CA.
Job Summary:We are seeking an experienced Strategic Finance Manager with a proven track record in financial planning and analysis within the high-growth startup ecosystem (Series B-D stages and funding). This role is critical in supporting the companyâ€™s strategic decision-making through comprehensive financial planning, reporting, and analysis. The ideal candidate will have a robust analytical skill set, excellent communication abilities, and a proven track record in enhancing financial operations through effective forecasting and financial management.
Key Responsibilities:Financial Forecasting and Modeling: Develop and maintain detailed financial models to support decision-making regarding Reebeloâ€™s future performance. Forecast financial outcomes under various scenarios and assist with the financial planning process.Budget Management: Lead quarterly and annual budgeting process and regular forecasting updates, including variance analysis to understand differences between expected and actual figures.Performance Analysis: Conduct monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reviews and provide insightful analysis of variances and trends. Prepare detailed reports and presentations for senior management highlighting business performance and recommendations.Strategic Analysis: Work closely with cross-functional teams to provide financial insights and analysis that support strategic initiatives and business decisions.Process Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvements to optimize financial practices and enhance accuracy and efficiency.Data Analysis: Utilize advanced data analytics tools and techniques to interpret complex financial data and report back actionable insights to key stakeholders.Global collaboration: Collaborate closely with other teams, particularly the SG finance team, to ensure seamless financial operations across time zones.
Qualifications:Bachelorâ€™s degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or related field.Has 6+ years of experience in Strategic Finance, FP&A, Big 4 accounting, investment banking, or corporate finance.Prior experience in high-growth or startup environments is required.Advanced financial modeling techniques and abilities with a deep understanding of best financial modeling practices.Exceptional analytical skills and the ability to synthesize complex financial information into clear, concise reports.Expertise in data analysis with advanced Excel/Google sheet skills and experience with financial software and systems.Exceptional analytical skills and the ability to synthesize complex financial information into clear, concise reports.Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the capability to navigate cross-functional collaborations effectively.
Nice to have:Marketplace experienceEcommerce experience Understanding of GAAP

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
